text: The Venezuela national under-20 football team represents Venezuela in the under-20 international football. They have attended the FIFA U-20 World Cup twice in their history with their best placing being runners-up at the 2017 FIFA U-20 World Cup in South Korea. ==Competitive record== ===FIFA U-20 World
